main_definition: To have put up or published something, usually online or through a mailing system.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To publish information on the internet or social media
meanings_and_examples.example: She posted her vacation photos on Instagram.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To share news with others by mailing physical letters
meanings_and_examples.example: He sent a postcard to his grandparents from Paris, informing them about his trip.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have made an appointment or scheduled something in advance
meanings_and_examples.example: She posted her dentist appointment for next Monday at 10 AM online.
The teacher posted the rules on the classroom door.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In sports, to score a goal or point by putting the ball in the target area
meanings_and_examples.example: He quickly posted two goals for his soccer team during the match.
